overview: Four professional women (Elsa Jean, Anna Foxxx, Casey Calvert and Ayumi Anime) cut loose in a gorgeous sun-drenched tourist town. They play hooky from a business conference and go wild for hot hook-ups with Beautiful Strangers and each other! This summer sex fest has a sexy surprise ending in store. Don't miss out!!!
tagline: Gorgeous girls on the ultimate summer vacation!
title: Beautiful Strangers
